It appears that classic Will Smith charm does not work on robots. On Thursday, the actor posted a video to his YouTube channel of his faux date with Sophia the robot, an artificial intelligence robot able to display more than 62 facial expressions. The AI was developed by Hong Kong - based Hanson Robotics and activated on April 19, 2015. Right off the bat, Sophia was skeptical of Smith trying to woo her, informing him that she was aware of his treatment of robots on film. ` ` They show us I, Robot just to make sure we don't get any ideas,'' Sophia said.
